name: Tokopedia - Dark Version
description:
[OUTDATE] Version 1.2 Dikarenakan Tokopedia terus melakukan perubahan, maka STYLE ini menjadi tidak sempurna. Jika perubahan tokopedia telah telah mencapai final akan ada UPDATE untuk STYLE ini.

Desktop version only
Version 1.2

a,.textarea-wrapper .placeholder{color:#bac0c0}.dropdown-menu{background:#101010;border:0;border-radius:0!important}.input-wrapper input{background:#333!important;color:#bac0c0!important;border:1px solid #1c1c1c!important;border-radius:0!important}.btn{background:#151515!important;color:#fff!important;border:0!important}.reply a,.share a{color:#f1d600!important}body.dark .suggestions li.header h5{color:#f1d600}body.dark .nav{border-bottom-color:rgba(255,255,255,.02)}.active .publisher-nav-color:after{background:#61962a!important}.post-actions{border-top:1px dashed #333}.post-actions .wysiwyg li a.attach span{filter:grayscale(100%) contrast(500%) invert(100%)}.post-content footer{margin-top:15px}.context-card .tooltip{border-radius:0}.tooltip{background:#151515;color:#bac0c0;padding:15px!important}.tooltip .content h3 a{color:#fff}#footer a{color:#f1d600!important}}
